ValidationRule.description: If Lien on Asset is not true or the record type is not Other loan then there can be no Lender because there is no loan
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISBLANK( Lender__c ) , OR ( Lien_on_Asset__c = False , RecordTypeId <> "012q00000001hTzAAI")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot have a Lender if there is no Loan
